bach.DataFrame.reset_index¶

DataFrame.reset_index(drop=False, inplace=False)[source]¶

Drops the current index.

With reset_index, all indexes are removed from the DataFrame, so that the DataFrame does not have any index Series. A new index can be set with DataFrame.set_index.

Parameters

  • drop – if True, the dropped index is added to the data columns of the DataFrame. If False it is removed.

  • inplace – update the current DataFrame or return a new DataFrame.

Returns

DataFrame with the index dropped or None if inplace=True.
